Package com.telran.pizzaservice.controller

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.telran.pizzaservice.controller.AdminController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/admin") public class AdminController extends Object
REST controller for an admin to make CRUD operations with pizzas and pizzerias
Author:
Elena Ivanishcheva

    • getAllPizzas

      @GetMapping("/pizzas") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Pizza>> getAllPizzas(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)
      Get all pizzas
      Parameters:
      page - Page number
      size - Page size
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a list of pizzas and HTTP status code

      Parameters:

      size - Page size

    • createPizza

      @PostMapping("/pizzas") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Long> createPizza(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid Pizza pizza)
      Creates a new pizza.
      Parameters:
      pizza - the pizza to be created
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the ID of the newly created pizza and an HTTP status code of 201 (Created)
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException - if the input Pizza resource is not valid

    • getPizza

      @GetMapping("/pizzas/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Pizza> getPizza(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves a pizza by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the pizza to retrieve
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the retrieved pizza and a HTTP OK status
      Throws:
      PizzaNotFoundException - if the pizza with the given ID does not exist

    • updatePizza

      @PutMapping("/pizzas/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> updatePizza(@PathVariable Long id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid Pizza newPizza)
      Update a pizza with the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the pizza to update
      newPizza - the updated pizza object
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with HTTP status code and response body
      Throws:
      PizzaNotFoundException - if the pizza with the given ID does not exist
      org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException - if the input Pizza resource is not valid

    • deletePizza

      @DeleteMapping("/pizzas/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deletePizza(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a pizza by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the pizza to delete
      Returns:
      an empty response with status NO_CONTENT if the deletion was successful
      Throws:
      PizzaNotFoundException - if the pizza with the given ID does not exist

    • createPizzeria

      @PostMapping("/pizzerias") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Long> createPizzeria(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid Pizzeria pizzeria)
      Creates a new pizzeria.
      Parameters:
      pizzeria - The Pizzeria object representing the new pizzeria to be created.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the ID of the new pizzeria and a status code of 201 Created.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException - if the input Pizzeria is not valid

    • getPizzeriaById

      @GetMapping("/pizzerias/{pizzeria_id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Pizzeria> getPizzeriaById(@PathVariable Long pizzeria_id)
      Retrieve a specific pizzeria by its ID.
      Parameters:
      pizzeria_id - the ID of the pizzeria to retrieve
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the retrieved pizzeria and an HTTP status code
      Throws:
      PizzeriaNotFoundException - if the specified pizzeria does not exist

    • getAllPizzasInPizzeria

      @GetMapping("/pizzerias/{pizzeria_id}/pizzas/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Set<Pizza>> getAllPizzasInPizzeria(@PathVariable Long pizzeria_id)
      Retrieve all pizzas available in the given pizzeria.
      Parameters:
      pizzeria_id - The ID of the pizzeria to retrieve pizzas from.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a Set of Pizza objects and an HTTP status code.
      Throws:
      PizzeriaNotFoundException - if the specified pizzeria does not exist

    • addPizzasToPizzeria

      @PostMapping("/pizzerias/{pizzeria_id}/pizzas") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> addPizzasToPizzeria(@PathVariable Long pizzeria_id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid Set<Pizza> pizzas)
      Adds the provided set of pizzas to the existing set of pizzas in the specified pizzeria.
      Parameters:
      pizzeria_id - the ID of the pizzeria
      pizzas - the set of pizzas to add
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with no content and a status of OK if the operation was successful
      Throws:
      PizzeriaNotFoundException - if the specified pizzeria does not exist
      jakarta.validation.ConstraintViolationException - if set of pizza is unprocessable

    • addPizzasByIdToPizzeria

      @PostMapping("/pizzerias/{pizzeria_id}/pizzaids") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> addPizzasByIdToPizzeria(@PathVariable Long pizzeria_id, @RequestBody Set<Long> pizzaIds)
      Adds the provided set of pizzas to the existing set of pizzas in the specified pizzeria.
      Parameters:
      pizzeria_id - the ID of the pizzeria
      pizzaIds - the set of pizza ids to add as pizzas
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with no content and a status of OK if the operation was successful
      Throws:
      PizzeriaNotFoundException - if the specified pizzeria does not exist
      PizzaNotFoundException - if set of pizza is unprocessable

    • deletePizzaFrommPizzeria

      @DeleteMapping("/pizzerias/{pizzeria_id}/pizzas/{pizza_id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deletePizzaFrommPizzeria(@PathVariable Long pizza_id, @PathVariable Long pizzeria_id)
      Removes the specified pizza from the specified pizzeria.
      Parameters:
      pizzeria_id - the ID of the pizzeria from which to remove the pizza
      pizza_id - the ID of the pizza to remove
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a null body and a status of NO_CONTENT if the pizza was successfully removed, or a status of NOT_FOUND if the pizzeria or pizza was not found
